channel.title: 頁首 on yachun
channel.description: Recent content in 頁首 on yachun

item.title: cal
item.description: #scr{ width:93% ; background-color: #9e9e9ea8;; } .common{ background-color: #80808080; width: 22% ; padding: 0px; border: none; } .special{ background-color: #5c87c3cf; width: 22%; padding: 0px; border: none; } .special.equ{ background: url(http://i47.tinypic.com/2ni0ahd.png) no-repeat; background-size: cover;} function donumber(e){ scr.value=scr.value+e.value } function clearscr() { scr.value="" } function doequ() { temp= eval(scr.value) scr.value = temp.toPrecision(15) }

item.title: jsil
item.description: console.log("我是主控台") document.write ("我是HTML文件") 後面是程式碼執行結果 console.log("我是主控台") document.write ("我是HTML文件") 什麼是javascript 函數 function print() { message = "HELLO cat" console.log(message) } function print1() { message = "HELLO 1" console.log(message) } function print2() { message = "HELLO 2" console.log(message) } function add1(arg1) {result = arg1+1 return(result) }

item.title: loop animation
item.description: #main{ width: 100vh; height:100vh; } #box{ position:fixed; border: solid green 2px; background-color: green; width:10px; height:20px; } let pos=10; for(let i=0;i
